summary: MegaTech Corp announced a $500 million AI research facility in Seattle, creating 1,200 jobs over three years with focus on natural language processing and computer vision.
questions: What is the purpose of MegaTech Corp's new AI lab?
Who leads the AI research division at the new facility?
How many jobs will the Seattle AI lab create?
What technologies will the facility focus on?
What was the CEO's statement about the investment?
title: Tech Giant Announces New AI Research Lab in Seattle
text: MegaTech Corp announced today the opening of a new $500 million AI research facility in downtown Seattle, creating an estimated 1,200 jobs over the next three years. The 200,000 square-foot facility will focus on natural language processing and computer vision applications. Dr. Andrew Chen, formerly of MIT, will lead the research division. CEO Maria Gonzalez emphasized the commitment to responsible AI advancement. Local officials highlighted the economic impact on Seattle's tech ecosystem.
claims: Job creation target is 1,200 over three years
CEO Maria Gonzalez made the announcement
